entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
